original_text: Like a person who is sick and loses the food from his stomach, God will cause the wicked person to lose all his riches. Like a person who is sick and loses the food from his stomach,
korean_text: 그가 재물을 삼켰을지라도 토할 것은 하나님이 그의 배에서 도로 나오게 하심이니

sentences.original_text: Like a person who is sick
and loses the food from his stomach
God will cause the wicked person
Like a person who is sick
and loses the food from his stomach
